name: Mr.Longman's Campgrounds
description:
Do you remember around the 2010s when everyone was creating a slenderman rip-off? Well this game is very akin to that type of era.

 Can you collect all of the milk and grow big bones before mr.longman sucks out your calcium? You be the judge!

 Fun fact: Mr.Longman is stupid and can be easily juked!

This is my first "horror game" you're welcome to bully my game as much as you want :) 

There will be coming a sequel and a remake in the future :)
